channel.title: 8-Ball(Pool) Tournament [Finished]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]8-Ball(Pool) Tournament[/size] http://www.playforia.com/play/pool/eightball/ http://www.miniclip.com/games/8-ball-pool-multiplayer (Recommended) [/center] [b]Game overview:[/b] Pool games are played on a table with 6 pockets, balls and a cue to move the balls around. Pool games are great to play by yourself or to play against others. There is a nice selection of different pool games for you to choose from. [b]Tournament explanation:[/b] [i]Round 1[/i] is the preliminary round. Each player will be randomly paired with another. Each pair is given 36 hours to submit a screenshot of a winner of a game of the round. The loser of that round is eliminated while the winner advances to Round 2. [i]Round 2[/i] is yet another preliminary round. The winning player of a pair in Round 1 will face the winning player of another pair in Round 1. Each pair is given 24 hours to submit a screenshot of a winner of a game of the round. The loser of that round is eliminated while the winner advances to the semi-finals. [i]Semi-finals[/i] is a round of 4 where players fight it out to qualify for the finals. The winning player of a pair in Round 2 will face the winning player of another pair in Round 2. Each pair is given 24 hours to submit a screenshot of a winner of a game of the round. The loser of that round is eliminated while the winner advances to the finals. [i]Finals[/i] is the ultimate round. Beat the other player and you win! Note: if all players complete a round before the round expires, the next round will begin! Additionally, because the previous attempt at this competition went to shit, any participant that disappears/doesn't reply will be disqualified. [b]Frequently asked questions:[/b] [i]What happens if I am disconnected during a battle?[/i] If you have overwhelming evidence that you were disconnected (ie, a screenshot), talk to me about it and you will be entitled to a rematch before the next round begins. [i]What happens if my partner doesn't reply to me during the round time?[/i] If you can't contact your partner, provide overwhelming evidence of your activity to me. If I also cannot contact your partner, you advance to the next round. Otherwise, which one of you continues to the next round will be randomly chosen. [i]Am I entitled to a rematch?[/i] Yes. However, you cannot force your partner to give you a rematch. Both of you must be willing to have a rematch. In short, you can play as many games as you wish but only post the screenshot of a game if your opponent does not want a rematch. If your opponent screws you over, (ie you win, he asks for a rematch, you lose the rematch, he refuses to rematch) then it's too bad. [i]What type of game do I play?[/i] [u]Just be sure you are in the "Eight ball" Lobby[/u] This is to ensure that all games are fair and all players played their best, please do at least a best [i]2 out of 3[/i] style play. If you wish to do more that is allowed as well, But you must play at least 3 games with the person you are paired up with. [b]Participants:[/b] [ol][li]Krackkid[/li] [li]Flame_[/li] [li]Bowser jr[/li] [li]Runescape Sucks[/li] [li]The Elve Age[/li] [li]Travas[/li] [li]Rodgerwilco[/li] [li]eyeownyew[/li] [li]Ambokile[/li] [li]asshole_rule[/li] [li]Christmas_tree[/li] [li]sk8rdude461[/li] [li]Arcik[/li] [li]LilXCj[/li] [li]Empty[/li] [li]Empty[/li][/ol] [hr]
Supreme Champion: Bowser jr Worthy Adversary: Travas 3rd place tie: Arcik Christmas_tree 5th place tie: LilXCj Ambokile Flame_ Empty 9th place tie: Rodgerwilco eyeownyew empty asshole_rule sk8erdude461 Kracky The Elve Age Runescape Sucks
[hr] Put in 2 empty slots to allow for anyone who wishes to enter late, They will have a week for now or we will move on as if no one was in that slot. Thank you and good luck any questions feel free to pm or post.
